assemblySpace.description: Total assembly Space in square meters
assemblySpace.title: Assembly Space

trace.description: Create an excel trace file (Yes or No)
trace.title: OutputTrace

ke_url.description: The URL for knowledge extraction to access its data for example http: //git.erp5.org/gitweb/dream.git/blob_plain/HEAD: /dream/KnowledgeExtraction/Mockup_Processingtimes.xls
ke_url.title: URL for Knowledge Extraction Spreadsheet

processTimeout.description: Number of seconds before the calculation process is interrupted
processTimeout.title: ProcessTimeout

seed.description: When using the same seed, the random number generator produce the same sequence of numbers
seed.title: Seed for random number generator

confidenceLevel.description: Confidence level for statistical analysis of stochastic experiments
confidenceLevel.title: Confidence level

currentDate.description: The day the experiment starts, in YYYY/MM/DD format
currentDate.title: SimulationStartTime

timeUnit.description: Used for input and reporting widgets.
timeUnit.name: Time unit

_capacity.description: capacity of the queue. -1 means infinite

_operationType.description: the type of operations that are performed manually in the machine

_schedulingRule.description: Scheduling Rule, one of FIFO Priority EDD EOD NumStages RPC LPT SPT MS WINQ

priority.description: The priority against other stations. If this station does not share resources leave empty

requireFullProject.description: Is this station an assembly? Yes: 1, No: 0

pool.description: The pool of workers that is used for this station. If this station does not share resources leave empty

dream.simulation.applications.CapacitySt.name: Machine
dream.simulation.applications.CapacitySt.description: A station processing items for some time given by a distribution
